amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 and printed in the Congressional Record to increase the U.S. quota in the International Monetary Fund, the dollar equivalent of 10,622,500,000 Special Drawing Rights, to remain available until expended.

action.text: Mr. Callahan raised a point of order against the Pelosi amendment (A002). Mr. Callahan stated that the amendment offered by Ms. Pelosi provides an appropriation for an unauthorized program. The Chair sustained the point of order.
